grading_system.description: Grading system not clearly defined in available sources. County enforces California Retail Food Code but specific grading methodology not documented.

inspection_details.frequency: Risk-based inspections required under California Retail Food Code
inspection_details.reinspection_trigger: Violations requiring correction and follow-up verification
inspection_details.public_disclosure: Inspection reports must be maintained on-site and made available for public review upon request per California Health and Safety Code

fire_safety_authority.department_name: Multiple fire districts serve Colusa County including Sacramento River Fire Protection District and City of Colusa Fire Department
fire_safety_authority.ansul_system_requirements: Commercial kitchen hood suppression systems require semi-annual inspections per NFPA 96 standards
fire_safety_authority.inspection_frequency: Every 6 months for kitchen hood fire suppression systems

regulatory_framework.food_code_basis: California Retail Food Code (commonly called Cal Code) - part of California Health and Safety Code
regulatory_framework.state_vs_local_authority: County-level inspections conducted by Colusa County Environmental Health Department
regulatory_framework.local_ordinances: County follows California Retail Food Code standards with potential local ordinances not specifically documented

confidence_notes: Verified county department, regulatory framework, and basic inspection requirements. However, specific grading system methodology and detailed fire safety authority structure not clearly documented in available sources.
verification_notes: Need to contact Colusa County Environmental Health directly at (530) 458-0888 to verify: 1) Specific grading/scoring system used (letter grades vs numerical vs pass/fail), 2) Detailed fire department authority structure for commercial kitchen inspections, 3) Local ordinances beyond state requirements, 4) Risk-based inspection frequency categories, 5) Public disclosure mechanisms beyond state requirements.
